SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.system.linux.liburing

Class IOUringNotificationRegister

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.system.linux.liburing.IOUringNotificationRegister
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class IOUringNotificationRegister extends Struct implements NativeResource

Layout


 struct io_uring_notification_register {
     __u32 nr_slots;
     __u32 resv;
     __u64 resv2;
     __u64 data;
     __u64 resv3;
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • IOUringNotificationRegister

      public IOUringNotificationRegister(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a IOUringNotificationRegister instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
